title: NerdApp
description: On demand IT support specialist to help you out. Verified Nerds will resolve your tech issues. Computers, WiFi troubleshooting, email configurations, Apple support, backup and restore and more! All you have to do is book a Nerd, choose on site or remote support, select a date and time that suites you, describe your problem and a request will be sent to all qualifying Nerds. Download our Nerd App
